CustomField.formula: IF( NOT( ISBLANK(Contact.Membership_Type__c) ),Contact.Membership_Type__c & " - ","") & IF( NOT( ISBLANK(Contact.Member_Card_Num__c) ),Contact.Member_Card_Num__c & " - ","") & IF( NOT( ISBLANK(TEXT(Contact.Membership_Level__c))),TEXT(Contact.Membership_Level__c),"")
CustomField.label: Membership Info
